name: GULF COAST WATER AUTHORITY
description: Regional water supply for municipal, industrial, and agricultural customers.
sampleDescriptions: Regional water supply for municipal governments, industrial plants, and agricultural irrigation.  Water reallocation process to be conducted through the Army Corps of Engineers.
